title: Please unban me
body:
Ok i understand i feed i did do that. But the reason i did i was really really pissed at my team flaming me and ganging up on me saying i was trash and saying i didnt mia even though i did and so i just snapped i know it was wrong and i should never do that i should just mute them, but for some reason i didn't and instead i fed them. I don't think i deserved the permanent  ban for this as i have never intentionally fed before, and i didn't get an email as well. i beg you to unban me and give me a 2 week ban or whatever punishment you see fit just not a permanent ban as i spent my money and my time into this gamel.Game 1

TugOnThis117: can u guys honur me so i dont lag again thx

replies.body:
>or whatever punishment you see fit 

I think they did that already.

Permbans are only after extremely intolerable behavior or repeated warnings and temporary bans. You did get an email, maybe look for it a little harder. You also got emails along with every previous restriction, failed to correct your behavior, and so you got banned.

Take it as a lesson for life. If you blatantly and repeatedly break the rules, you get wrecked. 

"Nobody warned me" is not a valid argument in court of lawls.
So guessing you didn't read my post i said i didn't get an email and i still haven't been 2hours.

No one cares how much money or time you spent.
You deserved it.
I understand it and i think i do deserve a punishment for this act but not a permanent ban.

If I worked at riot, I would unban you.




Just to ban you again for posting this QQ thread {{champion:17}}.

Also I doubt you were banned only for having 4 boots and 15 deaths, if you don't know me, let me tell you, I've done worse things.

Dont bother, your ban wont be removed. 4 boots and trolling on Ekko... they remove bans only if its mistake. Your ban wasnt mistake.
I understand i did feed and i was being really dumb but i don't think it was worthy of an perm ban and it won't hurt trying.
